scripts.license: npx rimraf CREDIT && node bin/cli -o CREDIT --returnError
scripts.build: npx rimraf bin dist && npx tsc -p src/tsconfig.json && npx rimraf bin/cli.d.ts && npx minifier bin && npx minifier dist && npm run license
scripts.prepare: npm run build && git add -A && git diff --quiet --exit-code --cached || git commit -m "build v%npm_package_version%" && git push origin
scripts.postpublish: git tag && git push origin tags/v%npm_package_version%
